dict.acceptation: 划船；使…成排；与…进行划船比赛；〈口〉争吵，吵闹；

sent.orig: Row, row, row your boat, gently down the stream.
sent.trans: 划、划、划你的船，缓缓的顺著溪流走。

sent.orig: The back row chair is smoother than front row Gauguin, entire spacious row space is joyful.
sent.trans: 后排座椅比前排更高更平坦，整个宽敞的后排空间让人欣喜。

sent.orig: Each row of holes punched in the cards corresponds to one row of in the design.
sent.trans: 打在卡片上的每一排孔对应设计的一排经线。

sent.orig: Row after row of women sat on an elevated platform, each showing off a Nintendo 3DS.
sent.trans: 行后，在一个架空平台妇女坐着，每个展示了一个任天堂的三维动画行。

sent.orig: It began with a row, it ended with a row, and little went right in between.
sent.trans: 它以吵架开始，又以吵架告终，其间也很少有发展顺利的时候。
